title: Comparing the whole life cycle carbon impact of conventional and biogenic building materials across major residential typologies in Ghana and Senegal
content:
Publication date: 1 July 2024

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 106

Author(s): Mae-ling Lokko, Frederick Wireko Manu, Nzinga Mboup, Mohamed Aly Etman, Marco Raugei, Ibrahim Niang, Kingdom Ametepe, Rosemary Sarfo-Mensah
